person.content:

Paragraph: The contract involved upgrading the flight data processing system at the Oceanic Control Centre in Prestwick in south west Scotland for National Air Traffic Services Ltd ( NATS ) , subsidiary of the Civil Aviation Authority .

| --- |

| Civil Aviation Authority |

Note: In this paragraph, "National Air Traffic Services Ltd (NATS)" and "Civil Aviation Authority" are both considered as "Person" entities, as they are organizations and not individuals.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |
| National Air Traffic Services Ltd (NATS) |

* Civil Aviation Authority (not a person, but an organization)
